de.gematik.ti.utils.primitives

Class Bytes

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gematik.ti.utils.primitives.Bytes

  • public class Bytes
extends java.lang.Object

    Static utility methods pertaining to byte primitives, that are not already found in either Byte or Arrays, and interpret bytes as neither signed nor unsigned.

    This class is inspired from com.google.common.primitives.Bytes (Apache License 2.0) http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html

    • Method Detail

      • concatNullables

        public static byte[] concatNullables(byte[]... arrays)

        Returns the values from each provided array combined into a single array. For example, concat(new byte[] {a, b}, new byte[] {}, null, new byte[] {c} returns the array {a, b, c}.

        Parameters:
        arrays - zero or more nullable byte arrays
        Returns:
        a single array containing all the values from the source arrays, in order

      • copyByteArray

        public static byte[] copyByteArray(byte[] input,
                                   int offset,
                                   int length)

        Copying array elements

        Parameters:
        input - byte array
        offset - starting position in the input array
        length - the number of array elements to be copied
        Returns:
        byte array with copied array elements

      • padData

        public static byte[] padData(byte[] data,
                             int blockSize)

        Padding the data

        Parameters:
        data - byte array with data
        blockSize - int
        Returns:
        byte array with padded data

      • unPadData

        public static byte[] unPadData(byte[] paddedData)

        Unpadding the data

        Parameters:
        paddedData - byte array with padded data
        Returns:
        byte array with data

      • bigIntToByteArray

        public static byte[] bigIntToByteArray(java.math.BigInteger bigInteger)

        Converts a BigInteger into a ByteArray. A leading byte with the value 0 is truncated.

        Parameters:
        bigInteger - The BigInteger object to convert.
        Returns:
        The ByteArray without leading 0-byte
